entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiled model and SQLite in EF Core error #32592
  • Compiled model - problem with large models #32591
  • "entityframeworkcore.design" domain is taken and redirect to NSFW contents #32590
  • After update to .net 8: Error System.InvalidOperationException : The property 'Id' is part of a key and so cannot be modified or marked as modified. To change the principal of an existing entity with an identifying foreign key, first delete the dependent and invoke 'SaveChanges', and then associate the dependent with the new principal. #32588
  • Custom value converter on primitive collections #32587
  • The current provider doesn't have a store type mapping for properties of type 'DateIndex'. #32583

Closed

  • Inconsistent behavior related to relationship cycle #32422
    8.0.x
  • Create migration bundle without requiring connection to DB #32485
  • Unable to use BulkInsert/BulkDelete #32584
  • Check commands[i] is not null for avoid NRE on Dispose command #22921
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate scaffolding migration file names #32589

Merged

  • Improve the relationship cycle breaking logic to detect cycles even when not starting on one. #32573
  • Revert the nongeneric DbContextOptions registration #32579
    auto-merge
  • Ensure connection and commands can be disposed in either order #32581
  • Stop re-using the same connection when running test queries in parallel #32580

Updated

  • Generate more information when failing to load EntityTypeConfiguration types #32577
  • [release/8.0] Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32582
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
